TalentsTiers.Name: Spiritual Focus
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Flash of Light and Holy Light by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Seals of the Pure
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Seal of Righteousness, Seal of Vengeance and Seal of Corruption and their Judgement effects by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Healing Light
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light, Flash of Light and the effectiveness of Holy Shock spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Intellect
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your total Intellect by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Unyielding Faith
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of all Fear and Disorient effects by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Aura Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Causes your Concentration Aura to make all affected targets immune to Silence and Interrupt effects and improve the effect of all other auras by 100%. Lasts 6 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Illumination
TalentsTiers.Description: After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a [@value]% chance to gain Mana equal to [@value2]% of the base cost of your spell.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Lay on Hands
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives the target of your Lay on Hands spell [@value]% reduced physical damage taken for [@value2] sec. In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by [@value3] min.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Concentration Aura
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional [@value]% and while Concentration Aura is active reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effect used against an affected group member by [@value2]%.  The duration reduction does not stack with any other effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Blessing of Wisdom
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the effect of your Blessing of Wisdom spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Blessed Hands
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of hand of Freedom, Hand of Sacrifice and hand of Salvation by [@value]%, increases the effectiveness of Hand of Salvation by [@value2]% and the effectiveness of Hand of Sacrifice an additional [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Pure of Heart
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of Curse, Disease and Poison effects by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Favor
TalentsTiers.Description:
2% of base mana
Instant Cast
2 min cooldown

When activated, gives your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell a 100% critical effect chance.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sanctified Light
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy Light and Holy Shock spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Purifying Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the mana cost of your Cleanse, Purify and Consecration spells by [@value]% and increases the critical strike chance of your Exorcism and Holy Wrath spells by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Holy Power
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical damage of your Holy spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Lights Grace
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Holy Light spell a [@value]% chance to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by [@value2] sec. This effect lasts [@value3] sec. Also passively increases the duration of Divine Shield and Divine Protection by [@value4] seconds.

TalentsTiers.Name: Holy Shock
TalentsTiers.Description:
14% of base mana
Enemy: 20 yd range

Friendly: 40 yd range

Instant Cast
6 sec cooldown

Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing 1296 to 1402 Holy damage to an enemy, or 2401 to 2599 healing to an ally.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Blessed Life
TalentsTiers.Description: All attacks against you have a [@value]% chance to cause half damage.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sacred Cleansing
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Cleanse spell has a [@value]% chance to increase the target's resistance to Disease, Magic and Poison by [@value2]% for [@value3] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Holy Guidance
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your healing spell power by [@value]% of your total Intellect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Divine Illumination
TalentsTiers.Description:
Instant
3 min cooldown

Reduces the mana cost of all spells by 50% for 15 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Judgements of the Pure
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the Damage done by your Seal spells by [@value]% and your Judgement spells by [@value2]%. Also your Judgement spells increase your haste by [@value3]% for [@value4] min.

TalentsTiers.Name: Infusion of Light
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Holy Shock critical hits reduce the cast time of your next Flash of Light spell by [@value] sec or increase the critical strike chance of your next Holy Light by [@value2]%. In addition causes your Flash of Light to heal targets with Sacred Shield for an additional [@value3]% over [@value4] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Enlightened Judgements
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your Judgement of Light and Judgement of Wisdom spells by [@value] yards and increases your chance to hit with all spells and attacks by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Beacon of Light
TalentsTiers.Description:
26% of base mana
40 yd range

Instant Cast
The target becomes a Beacon of Light to all party and raid members within a 60 yard radius. Any heals you cast on party and raid members will also heal the Beacon for 25% of the amount healed. Only one target can be Beacon of Light at a time. Lasts 1 min.
